abstract: Margaret and David revisit and review the classic film, 'Nashville' for 'The Movie Show'.
description: In 'The Movie Show', Margaret Pomeranz and David Stratton look back on some of the classic films of the past. In this clip, the subject is Robert Altman's 'Nashville' (1975), a breakthrough film for its episodic and improvisational elements.
